snippet.title: Mika and the Witch's Mountain | Coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch August 21
snippet.description:
Mika and the Witch's Mountain is coming to Steam (PC) and Nintendo Switch on August 21st.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1819460/Mika_and_The_Witchs_Mountain/

Inspired by Ghibli's Kiki's Delivery Service and The Legend of Zelda: Wind Waker, Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom.


#indiegames #cozygames #mika
